text: James Stoddard may refer to: *James Stoddard (author), American fantasy author *James Stoddard (Medal of Honor) (1838–?), United States Navy sailor and Medal of Honor recipient ==See also== *Jamie Stoddard (born 1977), Canadian football player *James Stodart (1849—1922), Australian politician *Sir James Fraser Stoddart (born 1942), Scottish chemist
title: James Stoddard
